Reviews.Title: I would recommend
Reviews.Author: sylvia L weeks
Reviews.Content: I Love this camera! . Can stop a car going by with NO blur!! Catch a bird up real close.

Reviews.Title: Itz never too late!
Reviews.Author: Jose Limon
Reviews.Content: Everything i was looking for in a Camera! Been really happy with the pictures i've taken so far! Would difinetly recommend it to friends....

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Hannah
Reviews.Content: This camera rocks! It is my very first "nice" camera and it is perfect. I took it on my weekend retreat and took over 500 pictures I loved it so much. It is great in low light and has a great zoom. Good first time camera.

Reviews.Title: s
Reviews.Author: Kamran
Reviews.Content: Great, very good quality. packaging is good. Price is good. very useful.Good brand, it is not fake.Thanks a lot.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Welsh
Reviews.Content: This camera can do so many things, it is awesome. My wife read the book online and it can do everything it promises.

Reviews.Title: Light and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: The camera worked as advertised but sometimes took longer to focus missing me miss some shots. Battery lasted a long time

Reviews.Title: Small-er power
Reviews.Author: Manuel Santiago DMD
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at easiness of use. Could get my wife to use it, she hated EOS. Photos are superb. There is no need for a higher complexity contraption for 99% of recording beautiful moments.

Reviews.Title: What an Awesome Little Camera
Reviews.Author: BabyBlueOnes
Reviews.Content: This takes incredibly crisp, clear shots close up (which is why I bought it).  It is easy to learn how to use it, thanks to the user guide provided.  The accessories that came with the camera are great.  My order was shipped quickly and arrived in excellent condition.  I highly recommend the camera.  The price was very reasonable for the value you receive.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Priscilla Thurmond
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I havn't figured out how to use the differant settings yet but on auto it takes good pictures. I have one complaint and that is the shutter speed. It doesn't take a photo as fast as it said it would or I expected it to, it does have a delay.

Reviews.Title: Hmh
Reviews.Author: Kur
Reviews.Content: Well camera is great and it has met all expectations, but package is little bit low level so that is why it is not 5 star rated..

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: mohamed aly
Reviews.Content: its a great camera that gave me the art of taking photos with great zoom 30x and 16 mb quality. stable image even in the zoom function. I just used it for only few days and I loved it. it contain many functions , I used only the automatic one. I update my review when I use the other wonderful functions. I recommend this as a second camera after a less perfect one

ProductInfo.Features:
16 effective megapixel, 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor
3-inch TFT color LCD with wide viewing angle
DIGIC 4 image processor
720p HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button
24mm wide-angle lens with powerful 30x optical zoom and optical image stabilizer
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera in Black + 16GB Memory Card + Classic Camera Bag + Accessory Kit
